name: Egyptian Mythology
title: Montu (Month, Menthu) - Egyptian Mythology
epithets: God of War and the Bull
description: Montu is the falcon-headed war god associated with the bull. Once supreme god of Thebes before being supplanted byAmun. God of military victory, martial prowess, and the raging bull's strength. Depicted with bull horns and sun disk. Pharaohs called themselves 'Mighty Bull, Son of Montu' when emphasizing military might.
searchTerms: god of war and the bull
